contentSections.imgTitle: Illustration of a joyful octopus wearing golden glasses
contentSections.desc:
I created 4 badges inspired by the postpostmodern style of art, employing instant cuteness by anthropomorphizing some animals to convey a few motivational messages. Each of the illustration of an animal has some human-object interaction in it. I thought this can be a unifying property that would also support consistency in these designs. I also created an icon for each badge that sits on the top.

The purpose of these badges is to be used as source of day-to-day motivation. Practical uses include laptop stickers, posters, index cards, etc. Used Adobe Illustrator to create the badges and then applied a filter using Adobe Photoshop.


Below is my implementation for management issues that arise in any organization. This cute octopus wearing golden sunglasses is a visual litote for saying that if an octopus can do it (although with 8 limbs), you can do it too!

contentSections.imgTitle: Illustration of a studious owl holding a book
contentSections.desc: Following the same theme here as before, the studious owl is a visual litote for inspiring people to do thorough research on a topic before presenting it to others.

contentSections.imgTitle: Illustration of a cool polar bear wearing sunglasses and waving "hello"
contentSections.desc: I had to put sunglasses on a polar bear. I love polar bears and think that they think that they are cool, so I listened to them. The posture of the bear is a confident one and it is waving at us, expressing itself.

contentSections.imgTitle: Illustration of an injured bison who has just been taken care of and wearing two bandages
contentSections.desc: A cute injured bison who has just been taken care of. The bison was nearly extinct in the 19th century and through this badge, I want to show that someone with a kind heart rescued this bison and it survived to live long enough.
